issue.title: www.bing.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.bing.com/search?form=MOZLBR&pc=MOZI&q=can+a+struct+containing+a+single+element+be+cast+to+the+type+of+that+element%3F&wlexpsignin=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bing.com%2Fsearch%3Fform%3DMOZLBR%26pc%3DMOZI%26q%3Dcan%2Ba%2Bstruct%2Bcontaining%2Ba%2Bsingle%2Belement%2Bbe%2Bcast%2Bto%2Bthe%2Btype%2Bof%2Bthat%2Belement%253F%26wlexpsignin%3D1) ### Comment > Logging in to Bing with AdGuard enabled doesn't actually log in. > > Expected behaviour: > Click on Sign In button, enter email and password, become signed in to Bing. > > Actual behavior, enter email and password, remain signed out of Bing. > > Workaround: > Disable AdGuard before signing in, then enable AdGuard afterwords. Username: `@Nobody1707` ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gfwr9akwdzk8cgo8wsswkkk40w08g4o16ksaw8fulx.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/7h84bw3qe5wc884k08ocs04ww00cc485t97956o12c.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.13 System version: | Linux x86_64 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Other extensions used: | Ruffle-nightly extension, Plasma integration, cppreference search WE, Reddit Enhancement Suite

comment.body: Sorry for the late reply, Deativating the Privacy Filter in AdGuard allows me to log in properly.

pull_request.title: address ad leftover
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

`https://www.cartacapital.com.br/`

### Add your comment and screenshots



1. Your comment

Hides top ad leftover.

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/70459964/4adb454a-36df-4a41-9f6c-08bcba4e4abf)

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://neko-sama.fr/anime/episode/19474-saijaku-tamer-wa-gomi-hiroi-no-tabi-wo-hajimemashita-04_vostfr](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fneko-sama.fr%2Fanime%2Fepisode%2F19474-saijaku-tamer-wa-gomi-hiroi-no-tabi-wo-hajimemashita-04_vostfr) ### Comment > bon , j ai des problemes de coupure de video qui vers le milieu de video s arette de lire et remet au debut de la video arete , depuis quelques jours . > meme en resolution 480 le probleme est le meme , donc cest pas un probleme liee a la memoire ou autre , c est surement liee aux scripts , les pop up passent plus trop , mais j ai cette nouvelle merde >_< > sur d autres sites d animes j ai pas ce probleme > > biensur adguard desactive c est la foire aux pubs Username: `@lafourminoir` ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/sodc05xy5ios8wocg8c0ssw0ccgokg0sbpry3clz6s.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/941wet87c10kg48k8o48wk80gc40o4csl5qnl0htv4.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.13 System version: | Windows 10 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
